decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
REASON:  To comply with the provisions of Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents: Location plan, Proposed Elevation & Floor Plans (July 2022)
REASON: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.

Condition : 3 - Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that order with or without modification), no window(s)/door(s) shall be installed in the side and rear elevation(s) of the development hereby permitted without the prior permission in writing of the local planning authority.
REASON: To safeguard the amenity of neighbouring residents in accordance with Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).

Condition : 4 - The proposed outbuilding hereby permitted shall only be used for purposes which are incidental to the enjoyment of the host dwelling at No. 21 Wemborough Road, Stanmore, Harrow, HA7 2DU and shall not be used as separate self contained accommodation.
REASON: To safeguard the amenity of neighbouring residents and the character of the locality in accordance with Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).
description: Single storey outbuilding in rear garden
